column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////So how good is Bavette's? It was so good that half way through my meal
column2: I went onto Opentable to find another seating when I return to Chicago.  That's how good this place is.  From the atmosphere (dark and sexy... great for those who are on dates.  I mean everyone looks good in the dark!)
column3: amazing service (Benjamin is one of the best... period.  His mustache also deserves its own call out)
column4: and the incredible food (who knew Brussels sprouts could be better than a steak?).
